patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with a credit card?
How do I pay for my order?
responses: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. We also accept PayPal.
Yes, you can pay with a credit card. We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.
Absolutely! We accept PayPal as a payment method.
You can pay for your order using a credit card or PayPal. We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

patterns: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
responses: Yes, you can track your order using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email.
Standard delivery typically takes 5-7 business days, but it may vary depending on your location.
For express shipping, your order should arrive within 2-3 business days.
The estimated delivery time for standard shipping is 5-7 business days, while express shipping delivers in 2-3 business days.

patterns: How do I return a product?
responses: Yes, you can return a product within 30 days of purchase. Please see our return policy for more information.
Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase. Please see our website for more information.
To return a product, please log in to your account and go to the 'Orders' section. You can initiate a return there.
